comments.author: Humayun
comments.content:
I would most probably be coming along. Also Haider and Omar are coming. Their email are haider@misl.org omar@misl.org.

Omar will be coming on his own jeep.

comments.author: Imran Fatmi
comments.content:
My vehicle is Toyota LC BJ73 in very good condition

i intend to bring total of three persons in my jeep if my 7 year old daughter can also come with us otherwise two.

I have been 4wheelin in Duabi for several years and i am familiar with the safety and other issues associated with off road driving.

looking forward for this trip. my first in Pakistan

comments.author: Rod Kayne
comments.content:
WOW what a trip THANK YOU all so much for sharing your beautiful country and lovely people with me. It goes to show what you read in the press is a load of hog wash This week end we had a collection of peoples from across the GLOBE all pulling together, laughing together, having good clean exciting fun. Keep up the good work

Thanks once again

Rod

comments.author: Omar Qureshi
comments.content: All, I’ve posted some photographs of the expedition at http://picasaweb.google.com/omar.qureshi/BalochistanOffRoading20070127

comments.author: Salim Khan
comments.content: Great pics Omar…thanks for sharing them with us!
